remarks: Property for two angles ABC and DEF to be congruent.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Mar-2020.)
statement:
iscgra.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
iscgra.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
iscgra.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
iscgra.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
iscgra.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
iscgra.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. P ) $.
iscgra.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. P ) $.
iscgra.e $e |- ( ph -> E e. P ) $.
iscgra.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. P ) $.
iscgra $p |- ( ph -> ( <" A B C "> ( cgrA ` G ) <" D E F "> <-> ( D =/= E /\ E =/= F /\ E. x e. ( A L B ) E. y e. ( B L C ) <" x B y "> ( cgrG ` G ) <" D E F "> ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d D x y $.
$d E x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d L x y $.
$d ph x y $.
